title.value: Shows the workflow tasks that have been completed and the next tasks outstanding for a particular document.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution

dql_value.value: select distinct q.task_name as Task, d.r_object_id, w.r_performer_name as performer, q.task_state as status, q.date_sent as date_sent, q.actual_start_date as date_started, q.dequeued_date as dequeued_date, q.due_date as due_date, wf.object_name as workflow_name, w.r_act_seqno as step, r_lock_owner from cd_controlled_doc d, dmi_package p, dm_workflow wf, dmi_workitem w, dmi_queue_item q where d.object_name = '$value(object_name)' and any p.r_component_id = d.r_object_id and p.r_workflow_id = wf.r_object_id and wf.r_object_id = w.r_workflow_id and w.r_queue_item_id = q.r_object_id order by wf.object_name, w.r_act_seqno
